meeting_info.location: Council Chambers, 6th Floor, City Hall, Dallas, Texas

agenda_items.title: Approval of Minutes of the September 4, 2024 City Council Meeting
Consideration of appointments to boards and commissions
agenda_items.description: Evaluation and duties of board and commission members (List of nominees is available in the City Secretary's Office)

agenda_items.title: Public hearing on property tax rate
agenda_items.description: A public hearing to receive comments on a $0.7047 per $100 assessed valuation property tax rate for the 2024-25 fiscal year.

agenda_items.title: Final reading and adoption of the appropriation ordinance
agenda_items.description: Appropriating funds for the FY 2024-25 City of Dallas Operating, Capital, and Grant & Trust Budgets - Not to exceed $5,263,461,468.

agenda_items.title: Setting the tax rate
agenda_items.description: An ordinance setting the tax rate at $0.7047 per $100 assessed valuation.

agenda_items.title: Ratifying the increase in total property tax revenues
agenda_items.description: A resolution ratifying the increase in total property tax revenues reflected in the FY 2024-25 budget.

agenda_items.title: Amending various chapters of the Dallas City Code
agenda_items.description: An ordinance amending multiple chapters of the Dallas City Code regarding fees and regulations.

agenda_items.title: Amending various sections of the Dallas City Code
agenda_items.description: An ordinance amending various sections of the Dallas City Code regarding departmental changes.

agenda_items.title: Authorize position changes and salary schedules
agenda_items.description: Authorize position changes and approval of Civilian and Uniform salary schedules for fiscal year 2024-25.

agenda_items.title: Amending Chapter 34, Personnel Rules
agenda_items.description: An ordinance amending Chapter 34 of the City Council Code by removing holiday pay for temporary employees.

agenda_items.title: Approval of health coverage plans
agenda_items.description: Authorize approval of the proposed health coverage plans and 5% premium rates increase for all health benefit plans.

agenda_items.title: Attorney Briefings
agenda_items.description: Seeking the advice of the City Attorney regarding various legal matters.

agenda_items.title: Real Estate Deliberations
agenda_items.description: Deliberate the purchase, exchange, lease, or value of real property.

financial_items.description: FY 2024-25 City of Dallas Operating, Capital, and Grant & Trust Budgets
Estimated Revenue from property tax increase
General Fund Revenue from various fees
Environmental Clean-up Special Revenue Fund Revenue
Employee Benefits Fund for health coverage
